divs: Sighting DetailsFor the past couple of weeks our family has viewed a diamond shaped object with multi color facets that pulse in the eastern sky at 9:15 pm every night. After looking at it thru binoculars and noticing it wasn't a star we decided to view it thru a spotting scope.It's very bright and seems to have some kind of nucleus that looks like a upside down T.It looks enigeenerd and not a natural object like a meteror.My husband thought maybe it was a satellite in sync with the earth's rotation,but after discussion we feel that it is much bigger than a satellite or the ISS.We are wondering what this could be and would very much like to know!
Summary: Seen thru a scope pulsing diamond object with facets with red/blue/green outer edge.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Flatonia
There were no other sightings in Flatonia on or around April 18th 2010
